snippet.title: Cartoon Universe! - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Cartoon Universe! by Warner Bros.

Join your favorite cartoon characters in ZANY FUN AND MYSTERIOUS ADVENTURES!

Cartoon Universe is set in the hilarious and fun worlds of Looney Tunes and Scooby-Doo! Go on exciting adventures with Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Scooby-Doo! and their friends. You can meet up with your friends, help each other solve puzzles, play mini-games, and just explore the universe. Most importantly, Cartoon Universe is a safe environment for kids to have fun!

Note: Cartoon Universe requires an iPad 2 or newer, iPad Mini, iPhone 4s or newer, or the iPod Touch 5th Generation.

EXCITING STORY DRIVEN ADVENTURES
Customize your own cartoon character to explore Cartoon Universe and solve mysteries! Watch the excitement unfold as you unlock and discover more than 20 adventure packed Episodes!

SAFE SOCIAL GAMEPLAY
Help your friends in real time while playing Episodes together, or hang out in one of many social hubs where you can chat, play, dance, shop and more!

MULTIPLE AREAS TO EXPLORE
Visit your favorite locations from the Looney Tunes and Scooby Doo! cartoons, along with new, exciting places like Suburbia, Mountain Town, ACME Faire, and Kracken's Cove! There is always something to see and do in Cartoon Universe!

10 GREAT MINI-GAMES INCLUDED
Play mini-games for prizes and to advance in the Episodes! You can earn special in-game items, Toon Tokens and more!

AMAZING GRAPHICS
A beautiful, vibrant world awaits you as every character, scene, and location is crafted to the highest quality standards. Explore your favorite cartoon locations in full 3D glory!

PLAY WITH OTHER iOS FRIENDS AND PC/MAC USERS
This app will let you connect with other iOS users, PC users, and MAC users all in the same game world! Start playing on your iPhone and play again later on your iPad or iPod Touch! You can access your character from each platform.

ALWAYS GROWING
Cartoon Universe is always expanding and growing with seasonal events, new hubs, episodes, and features!

PARENTAL CONTROLS
We've put parents in control giving you online tools to manage your child's account and account privileges. Cartoon Universe is a COPPA compliant game. 

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/ca/app/cartoon-universe!/id631436188

Homepage:

http://www.cartoonuniverse.com/
